title: OMG THIS RADS ERROR
body: i can't get in AND play lol cuz of this damn errors i did watch youtube some solving i did them correctly and it didn't work i really wanna play lol please do something or give me an answer i really need your help . Would be nice if you did try to help me or you would do something to help me but not only but hole people have the same problem right now a lot of interesting things coming like warwicks rework i really wanna see all this and even play it soo it would be nice if you do something for that problem because i start to really hate it  {{champion:14}}

replies.body: Where are you receiving a Rads error?  I don't recommend following any steps that's not provided in our support site, as it could cause issues especially if modifications to your game files are made.  Let me know!
